name: Coconut Curry Vegetables
description: Thank you, Violet Newell, for this recipe!

ingredients.name: Keema Curry Seasoning or Thai Coconut Soup Seasoning
sliced red, orange, and yellow peppers

preparation: In Wok, heat oil over medium heat.
In a separate bowl, mix seasoning with coconut milk; set aside.
Stir-fry onion, peppers, broccoli, and green beans until desired doneness, about 8–10 min.
Add cooked chicken and continue to stir-fry until heated, about 2–3 min.
Add coconut milk mixture; stir until heated throughout, about 2 min.
Plate and sprinkle with peanuts, if desired. Enjoy!

products.name: Keema Curry Seasoning (Pack of 3)
summary: A mellow, family-friendly blend with notes of garlic, mustard, black pepper, cilantro, and cayenne pepper.

products.name: Wok & Glass Lid
summary: Classic Wok with curvy side & generous surface area for stir-frying.
